DOC.brief_summary: The purpose Take Charge Study determine among overweight obese men woman type 2 diabetes whether 1 ) participate commercial weight loss program promote great weight loss weight loss maintenance one year compare usual care condition 2 ) whether differential weight loss response different dietary macronutrient composition ( low carbohydrate/higher fat diet versus high carbohydrate/lower fat ) .
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 year old Type 2 diabetes BMI 2545 kg/m2 Willing participate study diet arm ( high low carbohydrate diet usual care ) oneyear period Able comply require study procedure schedule Must live within San Diego Minneapolis area Pregnant , breastfeed plan become pregnant next year Serious medical condition psychiatric illness History eat disorder , food allergy food intolerance Have food restriction require special diet Objects frozen , process prepackaged food Inability moderately physically active Currently enrol weight loss program another diet intervention Current use weight loss medication supplement Planned surgical procedure impact conduct study Previous surgical procedure weight reduction Does transportation Have plan relocate area within 1 year HbA1C > 11 % , fast triglyceride > 600 mg/dL , serum creatinine > 1.4 mg/dL ( woman ) 1.5 mg/dL ( men ) screen baseline visit
